definition: still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else

sentences.english: The Thick Face, Black Heart practitioner understands that hitting back does not necessarily make you a bad person.
sentences.chinese: 厚黑學實踐者懂得，還擊不會使你變成壞人。

sentences.english: Gold good counter-attack said they found no evidence that this is hampering their duty.
sentences.chinese: 金好還擊說他們沒有證據，這是在阻礙公務。

sentences.english: The green warriors were firing back with their deadly rifles.
sentences.chinese: 綠武士們也用他們的武器還擊。

sentences.english: Walsh is wounded but is able to shoot back at his assailant.
sentences.chinese: 沃爾什受了傷，但是仍然向射擊他的人還擊了幾槍。

sentences.english: Lewis bobs, parries outside and counter-punches with the right cross.
sentences.chinese: 劉易斯低頭躲過，向外抵擋，用右手交叉拳還擊。

sentences.english: Bill retooled Microsoft to respond to the threat.
sentences.chinese: 比爾改組了微軟並進行了還擊。

sentences.english: Jack fires back at the assailant.
Iran has repeatedly said it would react with force to any attack.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗則反覆強調將對任何攻擊予以還擊。

sentences.english: I hit him and he quickly countered.
sentences.chinese: 我擊中他，他馬上進行還擊。

sentences.english: Strikers fought back, hurling firebombs at police, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他說，罷工工人向警方投擲燃燒彈還擊。

sentences.english: How do you know where to strike back?
sentences.chinese: 你怎麼知道向哪兒還擊呢？

sentences.english: In fact, IDSF never takes action in reaction to WDC.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，IDSF從不對WDC的行爲進行還擊。

sentences.english: He said he would kick back at his accusers when the time came.
sentences.chinese: 他說他到時候要對控告他的人進行還擊。
他對我的強擊進行還擊。

sentences.english: The fighter bobs, parries outside and hits back with the right cross.
sentences.chinese: 這個搏擊手低頭躲過，向外抵擋，用右交叉拳還擊。

sentences.english: People of Sirte have done a Counterattack and have pushed rebels back further 20 kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 蘇爾特人平易近的一次還擊致否決派蝟縮20千米。

definition: to bombard/to bomb/(fig.) to criticize/to roast
to rise in revolt/to raise difficult questions
to spar/to fight/to duke it out
chaotic warfare/confused fighting/melee/to join in such fighting
to fight back/to return fire/to counterattack
